DOC.brief_title: Comparison Of External Physical Vibration Lithecbole ( EPVL ) In Different Time After Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery ( RIRS )
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate efficacy safety external physical vibration lithecbole treatment residual stone different time ( 3 day ,7 day 14 day ) operation RIRS，thereby improve stone clearance rate . Investigators multi-centers randomize control trial ( RCT ) ，and investigator plan perform study 7 hospitals，which First Affiliated Hospital Guangzhou Medical University China , Department Urology , The Second Affiliated Hospital Zhengzhou University China , Jiangsu Province Hospital , Tongji Hospital , Hubei provincial people 's Hospital , People ' Hospital Huzhou，The First Affiliated Hospital Anhui Medical University China . Investigators plan begin study August 2016 end July 2017. three hundred fifty seven patient postoperative residual stone RIRS enrol study . By simple random sampling technique , patient assign group A ( EPVL perform 3 day RIRS ) , group B ( EPVL perform 7 day RIRS ) , group C ( EPVL perform 14 day RIRS ) ，compared three group patient stone clearance rate complications.By study , investigator hope determine best time perform EPVL , improve stone clearance rate RIRS，and provide good guidance clinical . The principle extracorporeal physical vibration lithecbole : A Simple harmonic motion technology multi-direction apply . The Lateral acceleration provide physical vibration device base harmonic vibration wave horizontal direction , induces urinary stone separate kidney ureter , expand move space stone . Meanwhile , axial effect produce push stone physical vibration device handle harmonic vibration wave multi- direction . Finally , help change position direction extracorporeally physical vibration machine , urinary stone discharge urinary collecting system . Number : 357cases ( 119 case respectively group A , B , C ) Grouping method : In trial , investigator use equilibrium randomization method generate random numerical code table , accord table , patient randomly assign different group . Evaluating indicator Stone-free rate 4 week RIRS . Incidence rate complication adverse reaction EPVL ( fever , hematuria , etc ) . Trial method : Cases selection group : 2 day RIRS , image KUB ( abdominal plain film ) , patient radiolucent calculus need examine CT demonstrate presence residual fragment , case meet inclusion criterion randomly assign group , ureteral stent remove 4 week ; Laboratory testing : blood routine , urine routine , renal function , coagulation function ; Strat treatment EPVL removal ureteral stent . Methods three group : Group A : EPVL perform 3 day RIRS ; Group B : EPVL perform 7 day RIRS ; Group C : EPVL perform 14 day RIRS ; Preparation EPVL : amount fluid intake 1000-2000ml , start treatment EPVL patient 's bladder filling ; Record : patient ' information ; Start treatment EPVL ; Patients follow measure : amount fluid intake 2000ml/d ; increase physical activity ; rest position uninjured side , patient low renal calyx calculus need invert body ; Whenever follow-up , patient undergo treatment EPVL . At last time follow-up , patient undergo EPVL first , remove stent , reexamine KUB . Follow timing : group A group B , patient reexamine 1,2 4 week RIRS ; In group C , patient reexamine 2 4 week RIRS . Follow project Laboratory testing : routine urinalysis ; Imaging examination : KUB kidney CT scan ( radiolucent calculus ) Complications adverse reaction .
